entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Freezing rain beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Monday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 1.
